# [Interview #1084: Ask the Author: Brandon Sanderson, Entry #41](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1084#41)

#### Question

Do Zahel and Hoid know each other? Can Zahel regrow limbs as well?

#### Brandon Sanderson

They've met.

Otherwise, RAFO.
